pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, October 7, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local food bank to mark Thanksgiving.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier-designate of Alberta, Danielle Smith.
